course_description: This is a survey of United States competition law. It covers agreements among competitors, horizontal and vertical mergers, unilateral conduct by monopolists, exclusive dealing and tying arrangements imposed on buyers by sellers, and restrictions imposed by manufacturers on distributors.
sections: Class Nbr: 1686, Section #: 001, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 12:30-2p, Instructor: A. Volokh, Status: Open
